content.raw: I merged the branch with current default and run the test again. Some packages are missing for the Xenial build [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/2/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/2/console). We probably need to install them from source.
content.html: I merged the branch with current default and run the test again. Some packages are missing for the Xenial build https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-xenial-amd64/2/console. We probably need to install them from source.
